@graph.name: Vegan Spanish Cauliflower Rice (One Pot, Low Carb)
@graph.description: This easy One Pot Vegan Spanish Cauliflower Rice is super easy to make! A great, healthy low carb alternative to white rice packed with nutrients.

itemListElement.name: Vegan Spanish Cauliflower Rice – Easy One Pot Recipe ( Low Carb)

@graph.name: Spanish Cauliflower Rice
@graph.description: This easy One Pot Vegan Spanish Cauliflower Rice is full of sweet and smoky flavors and super easy to make! A great, healthy low carb alternative to white rice packed with nutrients. Gluten-Free, Paleo, Low Carb, Whole30, and Plant-Based.
recipeIngredient: 1  and half large tomato divided (or 1 1/4 cup chopped)
1/4 cup  red or green bell pepper chopped
Cilantro and lime juice for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Rice the cauliflower florets if you have not already in a food processor by pulsing it a few times. (See tips for perfect rice)
recipeInstructions.name: Rice the cauliflower florets if you have not already in a food processor by pulsing it a few times. (See tips for perfect rice)

recipeInstructions.text: Then blend 1 tomato, onion, Jalapeno and spices until pureed smoothly.
recipeInstructions.name: Then blend 1 tomato, onion, Jalapeno and spices until pureed smoothly.

recipeInstructions.text: Add this blended mixture to a skillet and heat over medium heat and let it cook for 3-4 minutes until the onion does not smell raw anymore.
recipeInstructions.name: Add this blended mixture to a skillet and heat over medium heat and let it cook for 3-4 minutes until the onion does not smell raw anymore.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the bell peppers and rest of the chopped tomato and cook for a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the bell peppers and rest of the chopped tomato and cook for a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the cauliflower and mix and toss well. Cover, reduce the heat to medium-low and cook for 5 minutes
recipeInstructions.name: Add the cauliflower and mix and toss well. Cover, reduce the heat to medium-low and cook for 5 minutes

recipeInstructions.text: Open the cover, add some lime juice.  If cauliflower is not cooked to preference then continue to cook for another 2 minutes else fluff and taste and adjust for flavor and cover again for 2-3 minutes for it to steam.
recipeInstructions.name: Open the cover, add some lime juice.  If cauliflower is not cooked to preference then continue to cook for another 2 minutes else fluff and taste and adjust for flavor and cover again for 2-3 minutes for it to steam.

recipeInstructions.text: Garnish with cilantro and salsa and lime wedges, Store refrigerated up to 4 days
recipeInstructions.name: Garnish with cilantro and salsa and lime wedges, Store refrigerated up to 4 days

@graph.keywords: caulfilower rice recipe, healthy Spanish rice, vegan cauliflower rice recipe
